channel.title: Teachings on Kostas Kougioumoutzis
channel.description: Recent content in Teachings on Kostas Kougioumoutzis

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I have been part of the instructor’s team for the following postgraduate courses at the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens: BMP: Biogeography and Macroecological Patterns IRP: An introduction to R and Python

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I have taught the past three years the following undegraduate courses at the University of Patras: PB: Plant Biology II SPB: Special Topics in Botany
